sourcesContent: import e,{useEffect as t,useState as i}from"react";import l from"../utils/with-defaults";import m from"../utils/clsx";export default l((({children:l,className:a,visible:r,enterTime:s,leaveTime:o,clearTime:c,name:n,...u})=>{const[T,p]=i(""),[v,$]=i(r);return t((()=>{const e=r?"enter":"leave",t=r?s:o;r&&!v&&$(!0),p(`${n}-${e}`);const i=setTimeout((()=>{p(`${n}-${e} ${n}-${e}-active`),clearTimeout(i)}),t),l=setTimeout((()=>{r||(p(""),$(!1)),clearTimeout(l)}),t+c);return()=>{clearTimeout(i),clearTimeout(l)}}),[r,v]),e.isValidElement(l)&&v?e.cloneElement(l,{...u,className:m(l.props.className,a,T)}):null}),{visible:!1,enterTime:60,leaveTime:60,clearTime:60,className:"",name:"transition"});
